name: chordpro.vim
description:
chordpro.vim is a syntax file for files in the ChordPro format, a format for writing song lyrics with guitar chords.

The format was originally defined by Martin Leclerc and Mario Dorion for use with their chord utility, a program for creating nice looking lyrics/chords in PostScript. The format has become the most popular method for exchanging chords on the Internet.

ChordPro files typically has the extensions .chopro or .pro.
